mapper.select: insert into simple_board(title, content, writer, read_count, create_date, attatch_password, attatch_data) values(#{title},#{content},#{writer},#{readCount},now(),#{attatchPass},#{attatchData})

SELECT * FROM simple_board WHERE title LIKE concat('%', IF(#{text}="", null, #{text}) ,'%') OR content LIKE CONCAT('%', IF(#{text}="", null, #{text}), '%') OR writer LIKE CONCAT('%',IF(#{text}="", null, #{text}), '%')
update simple_board set read_count = (read_count + 1) where seq = #{text}
SELECT * from simple_board where seq LIMIT #{end} OFFSET #{start}

SELECT * FROM simple_board WHERE seq in (SELECT seq FROM simple_board WHERE (title LIKE concat('%', IF(#{text}="", null, #{text}) ,'%') OR content LIKE CONCAT('%', IF(#{text}="", null, #{text}), '%') OR writer LIKE CONCAT('%',IF(#{text}="", null, #{text}), '%'))) LIMIT #{end} OFFSET #{start}
